title: With This Ring
description: "The end of the year is the start of a whole new beginning "A "Tabloid Star" StoryJosh Bauer and Ryan Kellar sweated through a turbulent start to their relationship. Now that they've embarked on a life together, filled with family friends and each other Ryan's suffering sweaty palms again. For an entirely different reason.It's not the heat they generate every time they're alone together. It's not even the crush of people at Josh's jam-packed birthday party. It's the birthday present Ryan's carrying in his jeans pocket. The one that could make him the happiest man in the world, come New Year s Eve.If Josh says yesWarning: Hot guy on guy sex. A happily married couple and a rocking New Year s Eve party guaranteed to keep you up all night.
author: T.A. Chase
